trans-unit.source: Provides support for the behavior that enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for virkemåten som aktiverer [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endepunkt mottar HTTP-forespørsler fra en webleserbaserte ASP.NET AJAX-klient.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: When applied to an endpoint, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til et endepunkt, WebScriptEnablingBehavior virkemåten aktiverer [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] og ASP.NET AJAX-integrasjon, bortsett fra for kundestøtte som kreves for JavaScript objektet notasjon (JSON) koding.

trans-unit.source: Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> or by an appropriately configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Forskjellige typer koding, inkludert JSON, er aktivert av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>eller av en riktig konfigurert <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: The WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> and inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints.
trans-unit.target: WebScriptEnablingBehavior virkemåten implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>og arver fra <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, som aktiverer flere generelle Web programming modellen for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services eksponerer ikke SOAP-endepunkt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior: - Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt WebScriptEnablingBehavior: – Aktiverer HTTP programming modellen, inkludert sending til operasjoner som er basert på en URL-adressen suffiks, støtte for HTTP-verbet utvalget (POST eller få) og HTTP-buffer varighet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]HTTP-programmer modellen, kan du se [WCF HTTP Programming modellen oversikt over Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at standard HTTP-verbet POST når du bruker dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: – Aktiverer riktig-formatering for hver operasjon forespørselen og svar meldinger – for eksempel støtte for URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint.
trans-unit.target: – Aktiverer JavaScript Proxy-endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding and the WebScriptEnablingBehavior must be added to the endpoint behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: Kall til en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tjeneste fra en ASP.NET AJAX-klient tjenesten må konfigureres med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>bindingen og WebScriptEnablingBehavior må legges til samlingen endpoint virkemåte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either in configuration by adding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) directive in the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje i konfigurasjonen ved å legge til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>eller uten bruk av konfigurasjonen ved å aktivere sluttpunktet AJAX med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>i stedet for standard fabrikkinnstillinger i den [ @ServiceHost ](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) direktivet i SVC-filen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]forskjellige måter å aktivere en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tjenesten å svare på ASP.NET AJAX klienter, kan du se [oppretter WCF-tjenester for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>verdi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A>til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>verdi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder virkemåten til klienten på tvers av et endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>metode for å vise, endre eller Legg til egendefinert filtype kjøretiden klienten på tvers av alle meldinger som brukes til et sluttpunkt eller for bestemte operasjoner.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>som viser kontrakten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>som den egendefinerte virkemåten er brukt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder virkemåten til serviceendepunktet.

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles vanligvis av [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatisk når virkemåten er brukt i et endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: So there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: Det er derfor ingen grunn til å kalle denne metoden manuelt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>som viser kontrakten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>som den egendefinerte virkemåten er brukt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om automatisk Formater utvalg er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]automatisk format-merking, se [WCF Web HTTP formatering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis automatisk Formater utvalg er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen på meldingstekst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value is the only <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> supported and setting any other value results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>verdien er den eneste <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>støttede og aktiveres andre verdier resulterer i en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>som oppstod.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: This default value is the only valid value.
trans-unit.target: Denne standardverdien er den eneste gyldige verdien.

trans-unit.source: The body style set is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Meldingsteksten stil settet støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing request message format.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard utgående forespørselsformat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing request messages.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> brukes av utgående forespørselsmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen format settet er ikke en gyldig verdi for <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response message format.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard utgående svarformat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing response messages.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> brukes av utgående svarmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen format settet er ikke en gyldig verdi for <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir flagget som angir om en FaultException genereres når en intern serverfeil (HTTP-statuskode: 500) forekommer.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis flagget er aktivert; hvis ikke, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resten hjelpe siden er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resten hjelpe siden se [WCF HTTP-tjenesten å websiden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resten hjelpe siden er aktivert, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Bekrefter at endepunktet oppfyller som gjør at det fungerer som et ASP.NET AJAX-endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, and that the binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at endepunktet ikke er `null`, bruker HTTP eller HTTPS-skjemaene, bruker ikke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, bruker enten HTTP GET eller POST verb som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>for bindingen er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, og at bindingen inneholder en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>der <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden også kontrollerer at det finnes ingen SOAP-topptekster eller wrapper navn på metodene eller andre Ustøttet aspekter operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>som viser kontrakten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet oppfyller ikke ett av kravene for å være et ASP.NET AJAX-endepunkt.
